lines.text: If you want wild bird to sing do not put him in cage.
Aren't you rather jumping at conclusions?
It's remarkable, Mr. Chan, how you ever suspected Barstow. He puts up an excellent front.
Front seldom tell truth. To know occupants of house, always look in backyard.
Excuse. Every front has back and little things tell story - even in this room.
Strange that crime of passion should be committed with gloved hand.
I ain't got no time to waste answering questions. I've got my sleep to get the same as other people.
It is unasked question which prevent sleep.
But how could Lake's death possibly be connected with the Gray case?
Case like inside of radio - many connections not all related.
When death enters window, no time for life to go by door.
Regret do not understand English - only American.
